original_title: Ukrainian man arrested over mysterious Nord Stream pipeline attacks | CNN
article_summary: Italian police have arrested a Ukrainian man suspected of coordinating the attacks on the Nord Stream pipelines, three years after the explosions that left gas billowing from the pipelines and sparked an international investigation. The suspect, named Serhii K, is believed to have used a sailing yacht to carry out the attack, traveling from the port of Rostock, Germany. The arrest comes after German authorities issued an international arrest warrant for another Ukrainian man suspected of causing damage to the pipelines in 2024.</s>
